title: Youm-e-Istehsal to be observed in Saudi Arabia: Maroof Hussain
content:
KARACHI, Aug 03 (APP): Vice Chairman Jammu Kashmir Community Overseas Maaruf Hussain, said that Youm-e-Istehsal Kashmir will be observed in Saudi Arabia to express solidarity with oppressed people of Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu and Kashmir.
Various events has been planned including events at Pakistani embassy at Riyadh and consulate at Jeddah so that voice can be raised effectively against the atrocities and barbarism committed by India in the illegally occupied state, Maaruf Hussain who is also President of Pakistan Journalists Forum Saudi Arabia said in a telephonic conversation with “APP” on Wednesday from Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
Kashmiri people were incarcerated in inhumane siege for a long time and being treated in the most atrocious way in the history of humanity, he observed and expressed his unwavering and firm support and solidarity with oppressed population of IIOJK.
He stressed upon international community to hold India accountable for her atrocities so that barbaric siege of entire illegally occupied Jammu and Kashmir could be brought to an end and illegal migration and settlement in the valley could be prevented.
He asserted that resettlement in IIOJK was aimed at converting Muslims into a minority.
Entire nation should observe Youm-e-Istehsal enthusiastically to create awareness, make the voice of Kashmir loud and clear and convey the message of Kashmiris at international level.
